vclaim: Former U.S. President Donald Trump sent out a 2021 "Winter White House" Christmas card with phallic imagery and omitted a picture of his son Barron among photos of Trump family members.
title: Did Trump Send This Phallic Christmas Card in 2021?
subtitle: The card with a picture of former U.S. President Donald Trump read: "Merry Christmas From The Winter White House."
author: Jordan Liles
